entry.summary: There are times when it is necessary to be able to log the execution time of a method. The simplest way to achieve that would be to modify every method by adding Stopwatch or System.currentTimeMillis() at the beginning and at the end of the method. But it leads us to the following inconvenience: the same code should be repeated many times there is no easy way to turn on and off that But...
